titles.title: Slow down, take time "Breathe in," He said

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Slow down, take time "Breathe in," He said
He'd reveal what's to come
The thoughts in His mind always higher than mine
He'll reveal all to come

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
So take courage my heart stay steadfast my soul
He's in the waiting, He's in the waiting
Hold onto your hope as your triumph unfolds
He's never failing, He's never failing

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sing praise my soul find strength in joy
Let His words lead you on
Do not forget His great faithfulness
He'll finish all He's begun

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
And You who hold the stars
Who call them each by name
Will surely keep Your promise to me
That I will rise in Your victory!
